overview:
Prior to joining Like.com, Gaurav was Chief Operating Officer for myTriggers.com. Earlier, he was VP, New Business Development for NexTag. Prior to that, Gaurav worked at AOL as Vice President AOL Products, Partner Platforms. He has also held senior business development and operational roles with Veon (sold to Philips Electronics), Comcast Online (Comcast@Home) and Prodigy. Gaurav began his career in investment banking with Dean Witter (now Morgan Stanley ) in New York.

Gaurav received an MBA from Harvard Business School, and a B.S. in Economics with honors from the Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania.

relationships.title: Vice President, Business Development and Sales
